Uses of Class
hbl.jag.tri.lib.Node

    • Uses of Node in hbl.jag.tri.lib

      Fields in hbl.jag.tri.lib with type parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Node> DagData.nodes 
      Methods in hbl.jag.tri.lib that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node DagData.getTerminalNode(int nextVert)
      Utility that navigates the Dag Tree of the DagData structure and returns the terminal node that represents the triangle which contains the test point indexed in the DagData arrays by the nextVert index
      Node DagData.getTerminalNode(long x0, long y0)
      Alternate form of the utility that navigates the Dag Tree of the DagData structure and returns the terminal node that represents the triangle which contains the test point specified by x0,y0 which may not be an indexed vertex in the DagData structure.
      Methods in hbl.jag.tri.lib that return types with arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Node> DagData.getNodes()
      Getter to access class field as read only
      Methods in hbl.jag.tri.lib with parameters of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TriNeighbor DagData.minSeparation(Node termNode, int ptIndex)
      Utility method that checks the coordinates of a vertex indexed in the point arrays against the coordinates of a terminal node triangle's vertices and returns the square of the minimum separation
      void DagData.setNewEdges(Node termNode, int newPt)
      Utility method that implements a step in the Knuth algorithm implements step T2 p.75
